sourcesContent:
"use client" import type React from "react" import { useState } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { getDocumentsByCategory } from "../data/documentsData" import "./BrowseByCategory.css" const categories = [ { name: "Frontend Development", icon: "fas fa-code", color: "#667eea", description: "HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Vue", fileTypes: ["HTML", "CSS", "JS", "JSX"], }, { name: "Backend Development", icon: "fas fa-server", color: "#764ba2", description: "Node.js, Python, Java, PHP", fileTypes: ["PY", "JS", "JAVA", "PHP"], }, { name: "Mobile Development", icon: "fas fa-mobile-alt", color: "#06b6d4", description: "React Native, Flutter, Swift", fileTypes: ["DART", "SWIFT", "JAVA"], }, { name: "Data Science", icon: "fas fa-chart-line", color: "#10b981", description: "Python, R, Jupyter Notebooks", fileTypes: ["IPYNB", "PY", "R", "CSV"], }, { name: "DevOps", icon: "fas fa-cogs", color: "#f59e0b", description: "Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD", fileTypes: ["YML", "JSON", "SH"], }, { name: "UI/UX Design", icon: "fas fa-palette", color: "#ef4444", description: "Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD", fileTypes: ["FIG", "SKETCH", "PSD"], }, ] const BrowseByCategory: React.FC = () => { const [activeCategory, setActiveCategory] = useState("Frontend Development") const [filteredDocuments, setFilteredDocuments] = useState(getDocumentsByCategory("Frontend Development")) // Thêm state cho pagination const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(0) const filesPerPage = 8 const handleCategoryChange = (categoryName: string) => { setActiveCategory(categoryName) const filtered = getDocumentsByCategory(categoryName) setFilteredDocuments(filtered) setCurrentPage(0) // Reset về trang đầu } const getCategoryStats = (categoryName: string) => { return getDocumentsByCategory(categoryName).length } // Cập nhật logic hiển thị files const totalPages = Math.ceil(filteredDocuments.length / filesPerPage) const currentFiles = filteredDocuments.slice(currentPage * filesPerPage, (currentPage + 1) * filesPerPage) return (

Browse Files by Category

Discover and download files organized by technology and expertise

{categories.map((category) => { const docCount = getCategoryStats(category.name) const isActive = activeCategory === category.name return (
handleCategoryChange(category.name)} style={{ "--category-color": category.color } as React.CSSProperties} >
{docCount} files

{category.name}

{category.description}

{category.fileTypes.map((type) => ( {type} ))}
Browse Files
) })}

Popular in {activeCategory} ({filteredDocuments.length} files)

View All Files
{currentFiles.map((doc) => (

{doc.title}

{doc.fileSize} {doc.fileType}
{doc.downloads}
{doc.rating}
))}
{filteredDocuments.length === 0 && (

No files in this category yet

Be the first to upload files in {activeCategory}

Upload Files
)} {totalPages > 1 && (
{Array.from({ length: totalPages }).map((_, index) => (
)}
) } export default BrowseByCategory
